codeEditor.name: Code Editor
codeEditor.warningEmptyIsNotAllowed: An empty alphabet is not allowed!
codeEditor.warningNoValidJSON: No valid JSON! Your input must be in JSON format!

1.headline: How to use
1.description:
You can configure the Turing machine via the code editor in JSON format. 
 For this, an empty tape, specifications and an empty table are available by default.

2.headline: Download
2.description: You can save your Turing machine as a JSON file, click the download button to do so (

3.headline: Upload
3.description: You can also load your programmed Turing machine back into the editor by clicking upload button (

4.headline: Shortcuts
4.description:
In the editor, shortcuts can be used to generate the corresponding code. 
 The following shortcuts can be used within the editor:

shortcuts.specifications: specifications - creates the code framework for entering the specifications.
shortcuts.alphabet: alphabet - creates the code frame for the input alphabet.
shortcuts.alphabet_#_1: alphabet_#_1 - creates code for an input alphabet with # and 1.
shortcuts.alphabet_0_1: alphabet_0_1 - creates code for an input alphabet with 0 and 1.
shortcuts.states: states - generates code for input states.
shortcuts.states_q1_q2: states_q1_q2 - generates code for the states q1 and q2.
shortcuts.startState: startState - generates the code frame for the input of the initial state.
shortcuts.startState_q1: startState_q1 - generates code for initial state q1.
shortcuts.endStates: endStates - generates the code frame for the input of the final state.
shortcuts.endStates_q2: endStates_q2 - generates code for final state q2.
shortcuts.table: specifications - generates the code skeleton for entering the table.
shortcuts.addUn: addUn - generates the complete code to program the Turing machine for the addition of two unary coded numbers, seen in the example section.
shortcuts.mespuma_addBin: mespuma_addBin - generates the complete code to program the Turing machine for the addition of two binary coded numbers in a Multi-Track machine.
